prompt.content: Calculate CAKEâ€™s Q2-FY2025 end-of-period comparable restaurant base for The Cheesecake Factory segment. Assume none of the restaurants opened over the last six quarters were closed. Express your answer as a whole number.

messages.content: [{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Recognize that restaurants enter comps in their 19th month of operation."},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Recognize from the assumptions that closed restaurants are excluded from comps."},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Reported EOP The Cheesecake Factory restaurants at Q2-FY2025 = 216"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Restaurants opened in Q2-FY2025=2 "},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Identify restaurants opened in Q1-FY2025 as = 0"},{"criteria":"Identify restaurants opened in Q4-FY2024 as = 2","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Identify restaurants opened in Q3-FY2024 as = 0"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Identify restaurants opened in Q2-FY2024 as = 1"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Total restaurants opened in the last six quarters = 5"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Calculated end-of-period comparable restaurant base for The Cheesecake Factory at Q2-FY2025 = 211"}]
